segments.text: In this indoor kitchen drawing, daylight filters through the open window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces left, drying a plate with complete concentration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's dressed simply in a dress and apron, one foot unknowingly in the growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink behind her is a disaster—water overflowing steadily from the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: No plug in sight, and the drain isn't working; it's flooding the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she's missing this entire catastrophe right at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacked bowls and plates sit on the counter, innocent bystanders.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Shifting left, the boy climbs the stool toward the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach is extended, hand in the cookie jar, plate in the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool is unstable, tilting back— he could fall any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl watches eagerly, arm outstretched for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their mischief is cute, but so risky with the wet floor nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden's calm path and bushes seem worlds away from this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a mix of worry and amusement watching this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
